review_data.content: Sehr freundliche Bedienung, ausgezeichnete Schokogipfli, guter Kaffee, sehr leckeres Bircher-Müsli; hier kann man gut sitzen und in den Tag starten

review_data.title: Nice place to stop
review_data.content: Nice little cafe in a convenient location. We had the hot chocolate and a nice cake. We sat outside which was great for people watching. The quality was good, but not as special as hoped it would be, but still worth the visit.

review_data.title: Nicht mehr so kitschig wie früher, schade

review_data.title: Bad Bubbly cappuccino!
review_data.content: The place is not that bad and all the pastries looks good, I didn’t try them but I did try a cappuccino and I would not advice it to anybody..

review_data.title: Quaint little cafe
review_data.content: Good coffee, snacks and such. Quiche, baked goods, breakfast. Right at the convergence of the trains and the old Town. Great way to start the morning.

review_data.title: My Morning Start From Cafe Schurter

review_data.title: Comme un Starbucks
review_data.content: C'est comme un Starbucks mais je dirais que la qualité est sensiblement meilleure. Les locaux sont très propres.

review_data.title: Breakfast, lunch, snack....
review_data.content: eat in or take-away. This cafe is around the corner from our hotel, and we used for a late afternoon snack, morning breakfast and take-away lunch. The selection is good for a small cafe and the coffee is excellent. Reasonably priced, seems to be popular...More

review_data.title: good-priced breakfast
review_data.content: Hotel-breakfast in Zurich is just too expensive. Hearty sandwiches, plain bakery items, pastries and great coffee. Pleasant seating area.

review_data.title: Please, smile to the customers :-) !
review_data.content: Nice little café close the main station, wonderful muffins, sandwiches, latte macchiatos etc. Comfortable place, but every time I come, the waitresses are unfriendly and never smile, sad. Smile, it's free :-) !

review_data.title: Adequate food and drinks
review_data.content: We had a quick lunch here that appeared popular with locals. There was a small selection of food- mainly salad, sandwiches and slices of quiche with some sweet baked goods. The quiche was a little dry but would've been tasty - I think it'd been...More

review_data.title: Small café located at Central Station and the Niederdorf
review_data.content: This small café located at Central station and next to the Pölybahn has a couple of sidewalk tables with a view over the central station. Inside there are wooden tables and chairs and tall tables. On the menu is a light breakfast, pastries, sweets, cookies,...More
